title: Livemailer

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can target dead players.
- If your target is still dead by the next day, or died the same night you targeted them, they will be notified they were Livemailed. The next day, they will be able to speak as if they were alive.

desc:
Post 3817
*"Seon forgot to take my talking permissions away" - psycho*
*"Bmer alert" - penguin*
